text: Pas, ʙa farmoni Alloh taolo, onhoro sikast dodand va Dovud [cavoni nerumandu sucoe, ki dar laskari Tolut ʙud] Colutro kust va Alloh taolo farmonravoivu nuʙuvvatro ʙa u ʙaxsid va az on ci mexost, ʙa u omuxt; va agar Alloh taolo [fitnai] ʙarxe az mardumro tavassuti ʙarxi digar [dur namekard] namerond, hatman zamin taʙoh megardid; vale Alloh taolo ʙar cahonijon ʙaxsis dorad
